items.headline: Dollar General says it’s getting the ‘value’ thing right. The stock is rallying.

items.headline: Sorry, Siri: Why this iPhone user is switching to the new Google Pixel 10

items.headline: If Taylor Swift asks Travis Kelce for a prenup, she’ll have plenty of company among millennial women
